```{r}
netmat<-rbind(c("A","B"),
              c("A","C"),
              c("B","C"),
              c("B","D"),
              c("C","E"))
netmatdf<-data.frame(netmat)
netmatdf
netmat.edge<-netmatdf
netmat.graph<-network(netmat.edge,matrix.type="edgelist")
summary(netmat.graph)
gden(netmat.graph)
gplot(netmat.graph,displaylabels=TRUE)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(igraph)
install.packages("intergraph")
library(intergraph)
data(Bali)
```


```{r}
op<-par(mar=c(0,0,12,0),mfrow=c(1,2))
deg<-degree(Bali, gmode="graph")
plot(Bali,vertex.cex=deg,main="Raw")
plot(Bali,vertex.cex=log(deg),main="Adjusted")
par(op)
```
